items.title: How Your Brand Can Win the Holiday Gift Guide Game in 2025
items.description: Getting your brand’s products featured in gift guides can boost your holiday sales. These strategies can help you nab placement.

items.title: 5 Marketing Tactics to Turn Customers Into Evangelists—Without a Big Budget
items.description: CEOs of Inc. 5000 companies Empify and Wisp explain how to build bonds with customers, and make them your best advocates.

items.title: Another AI Winter Is Coming—But This One Will Be Different
items.description: Right now we are in an AI summer. It’s possible we’re heading toward an AI winter. But that doesn’t mean the end of AI.

items.title: Gen-Z Talks About Their Salaries Openly. Should Your Company Embrace Pay Transparency?
items.description: Some countries have laws mandating salaries be public knowledge. The U.S. plays by different workplace rules, but things might be changing.

items.title: Your Staff Are Hiding Their Menopause Symptoms. Here’s How You Can Help
items.description: An open, supportive company culture may help many women feel safer about discussing their experiences.
